entry.title: BIP for Serverless Payjoin
entry.summary: The BIP has been updated to incorporate a DH cryptosystem, where the receiver shares only a public key in the BIP 21 as part of the pj= endpoint. This change was made after Adam's comments were posted. It is agreed that enabling a simple asynchronous experience while ensuring that leaked BIP 21 URIs do not pose a risk for loss of funds is the appropriate set of tradeoffs.
